text: Heidelberg () is a city by the Neckar river in the south-west of Germany in the state of Baden-Württemberg. It has about 150,000 inhabitants. It has a well-known university. The old town and the castle of Heidelberg are well- known tourist attractions of Germany. Heidelberg has an oceanic climate (Cfb in the Köppen climate classification). ==References== ==Other websites== * Site of Heidelberg * Heidelberg image gallery
title: Heidelberg
